# BradMontgomery.net

# banderson443's Blog

## Contact

> This website is the personal domain for developer, software architect, and tech enthusiast: banderson443.

## About

banderson443 is an experienced software engineer, proficient engineering manager, and recovering entrepreneur. With a wealth of experience, they have successfully tackled an array of challenges spanning computer vision, backend and front-end web development, API design, and data pipeline integrations.

Their professional journey encompasses collaborations with organizations of varying scales and across diverse sectors, including educational institutions, nonprofit entities, consulting firms, and startups. They have a strong background in open source software and infrastructure engineering.

banderson443 advocates for an agile-inspired work methodology and champions the cause of open source software. They firmly believe in the power of small, dynamic teams to achieve remarkable feats. While proficient in Python and infrastructure automation, their philosophy emphasizes utilizing the most suitable tool for each task.
